commit message: Fixed typo in the AC file.
Use arrays as intent extra instead of strings seperated by '\n'.

Reduced screens or presses for comparing a dump via editor.

Removed some unneeded code.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:ikarus23/MifareClassicTool
Suggest a filename when saving a tag (UID+Date+Time).
Remember file name after saving.
Fixed a lot of typos. Thanks to 'systemcrash'.
Some code cleanup. Thanks to 'systemcrash'.
Added list of devices that have been known to work with MCT.

Fixed false positives of the MF Classic support detection.

See: https://github.com/ikarus23/MifareClassicTool/issues/44
Check for Mifare Classic support on startup. Thanks to 'domints'.
LG G2 mini, G3 S and F60 are not supported. Thanks to 'domints'.

Sony Xperia Z2 (& Tablet) is not supported.

Sorted the incompatibility list.
Updated strings that contain HTML for better readability.

Remember the choice to use MCT in editor only mode.

Deactivate read/write functions if the device does not support
Mifare Classic.
Fixed the remember function from the last commit.
Removed unused color.
Partial implemented safe quitting. Not working yet.
False alarm: Sony's Xperia Z2 should work with MCT.

Implemented safe quitting for editors.

Not documented yet.
Added the documentation for safe quitting.
Merge branch 'safe_quitting'

New release: 1.8.2

Updated changelog.
Increased version number.
